txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Matted fur from the beasts prowling the Shire. Bounders are looking for proof of those who are assisting them in keeping the Shire safe. Deliver the furs to Hal Hornblower at Hobbiton centre.
'These appear to be the furs that the Bounders wanted. So many strange creatures making their way about the Shire these days.\n\n'Thank you, kindly.'
'Bounders are looking for assistance in controlling the growing population of frightening beasts throughout the Shire.'
Hal Hornblower wants matted fur. Hal can be found near the stable in the centre of Hobbiton.
Deliver the matted furs to Hal Hornblower in Hobbiton
You have accepted a task to acquire matted fur for the bounders of the Shire. They have deputized Hal Hornblower to collect the items near the stables in Hobbiton.
Wanted: Matted fur from the beasts prowling the Shire.
